description.value:
Activate 1 Interact

The save for addiction to succubus kiss is @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|name:Succubus Kiss Addiction|traits:virulent|showDC:owner], and the addiction has the virulent trait.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24|showDC:owner]

Onset 1 minute

Maximum Duration 8 hours

Stage 1 +2 item bonus to initiative checks (10 minutes) and to all saving throws against emotion and mental effects

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Pkk8m79MoT1RgtfW]{Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 1)}

Stage 2 as stage 1 plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 hour)

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.zDuuHVeHgd175pGf]{Effect: Succubus Kiss (Stage 2)}

Stage 3 as stage 2 plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blindness} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafness} (1 hour)

Stage 4 blindness and deafness (1 hour)

Stage 5 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Absalom, City of Lost Omens
